tool_description:
ENG: 
Our Pharma Industry Data Collection provides access to millions of news, articles, opinions and reports from media and blogs sources around the world, all in real time. With this comprehensive resource, you can stay up-to-date on a wide range of topics related to the pharmaceutical industry, including information on companies, brands, products, medicines, consumer opinions, legislation, and industry news, among others. Plus, our data collection is available in multiple languages, making...
